summary: The Purple Heart Veterans Education Act of 2025 amends Title 38 of the United States Code to allow veterans awarded the Purple Heart for service on or after September 11, 2001, to transfer their unused Post-9/11 Educational Assistance benefits to eligible family members. This includes specifying eligible dependents, setting limits on transferred months, outlining revocation and modification processes, defining commencement of use, and addressing administrative matters, including age limitations for child transferees, and overpayment concerns.
